description:
When it comes to all things DEI, you would hope that the Biden Administration would leave the medical field out of it. But that would mean the White House prioritizes health and that they don’t - they prioritize skin color. Subsequently, the Biden-Harris Administration has announced it will prioritize equity when it comes to accessing kidney transplants.

“The organ transplant industry, like every other part of society, is not immune to racial inequities,” said HHS
title: Biden Administration Pushing DEI Incentives In Order For Americans To Receive An Organ Transplant

description:

No Democrat governor has spoken out against this because silence is violence. However, 24 out of 27 GOP governors are warning Sleepy Joe about the unconstitutional power grab this would entail. Howev
title: 24 GOP Governors Warn Biden Against New Pandemic Treaty That Would Transfer Power To The WHO

description:

However, the left has injected the movement with steroids and we are at the point where any subjective feeling or thought must be affirmed no matter how deranged or bizarre it is. So much so that even drag queens have started to invade storytime.

Drag queens are especially annoying because their entire portrayal of women is misogynistic and over-sexualized in extreme ways that there's no way for one to deny that they aren't mocking women. And when you combine that with trans ideology, you get this story.

title: RuPaul’s Drag Race performer shows off disgusting double mastectomy "costume," because trans joy or something

description:
Crowder spoke with three young women who feel that they’ve been lied to, as they have been having difficulty finding jobs in their fields and realize the opportunities their parents had are no longer a reality.

This video may prove that even young women are leaning toward Trump.

These three women were told that if they went through the educational system and graduated college with good grades, they would be set. However, that is not the status quo, as all three are struggling to find entry-level jobs with experience and degrees, especially considering the competition with foreign applicants who are also educated and qualified. And on top of all that, they are competing against diverse hires and are basically being set up for failure.

title: Watch as Crowder gets these Gen-Z chicks to flip for Trump in real time!

title: That dude who paid $14k to turn himself into a dog? He's changed his mind after realizing how difficult a dog's life is
